measured_by: difference score of switch rates when advisor disagreed vs. agreed

measured_by: difference between following helpful vs. misleading conflicting advice
justification: “Resistance to false advice was calculated by taking the proportion of trials in which participants followed helpful advice … minus the proportion of trials in which participants followed false advice.”
